detaileddescription.para: Builds the MPO hamiltonian as a rank 4 tensor. Notation following Schollwöck (2010)
H = - Σ J_{i} sz_{i} sz_{i+1} + h_{i} sx_{i} + l*(h_avg sx_i sx_{i+1} + J_avg sz_{i} sz_{i+2})

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< std::vector< double >> chain_parameters, bool reverse=false) override
memberdef.name: set_full_lattice_parameters

memberdef.argsstring: (int position, int sites, std::vector< Eigen::MatrixXcd > &SX, std::vector< Eigen::MatrixXcd > &SY, std::vector< Eigen::MatrixXcd > &SZ) const override
memberdef.name: single_site_hamiltonian
